backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata listing implemented Valentine features, linked files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose for the Valentine app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point linking root div and loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main UI showing the Valentine prompt, evasive No button, and acceptance celebration with image.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook managing creation and caching of authenticated or anonymous backend actors.
frontend/src/hooks/useEvasiveNoButton.ts: Hook that randomizes the No button’s position on hover or touch.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity management, and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty file reserved for query-related utilities.
frontend/src/index.css: Romantic-themed global CSS variables and utilities for the Valentine UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entry point initializing QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS config extending theme colors, container, animations, and using typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a romantic Valentine web app with Yes/No interactions, image reveal, and pending feature requests.
